name: Gore Tank
description:
Full Screen for best experience!

Your attempted coup of Hell has failed. The Devil impressed with your pluck has granted you one final boon, his favorite ravenous tank before casting you in to the arena to perish. Now you must grind up The Devil's minions to to power your guns. Survive as long as you can.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement (Tank Controls, Up/Down for Forward/Back and Left/Right to Rotate)

Mouse - Aims Turret

Left Mouse Button - Cannon

Right Mouse Button - Machine Gun

Left Shift/Right Shift  - Speed Boost

Crush or shoot enemies to make them explode into giblets. Collect the giblets to fuel your weapons. 

CRUSH. GORGE. KILL.

Music Credits:

Bloodletter    - The Chayed
Duke It Out   - Joseph Gilbert / Kistol
Domination   - Fato Shadow
Revenge         - Insydnis
